content.text: Match ends, BATE Borisov 0, Shakhtar Donetsk 7.
Second Half ends, BATE Borisov 0, Shakhtar Donetsk 7.
Foul by Evgeni Yablonski (BATE Borisov).
Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fred.
Attempt missed. Anri Khagush (BATE Borisov) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Dmitri Baga.
Foul by Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk).

Corner,  Shakhtar Donetsk. Conceded by Sergei Chernik.

Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ilya Aleksievich (BATE Borisov).
Attempt blocked. Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Goal!  BATE Borisov 0, Shakhtar Donetsk 7. Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar Donetsk) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) is shown the yellow card.

Attempt missed. Mikhail Gordeychuk (BATE Borisov) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Dmitri Baga.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Dmitri Baga replaces Nikolai Signevich.
Attempt blocked. Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Yaroslav Rakitskiy.
Attempt missed. Anri Khagush (BATE Borisov) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Aleksandr Karnitski.

Attempt missed. Aleksandr Karnitski (BATE Borisov) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nikolai Signevich with a headed pass.
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Marlos replaces Douglas Costa.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Vitali Gayduchik replaces Nemanja Tubic.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Ilya Aleksievich replaces Dmitri Likhtarovich.
